constuctors.name: Cookie
constuctors.signature: public Cookie(String name, String value, String path, Integer maxAge, Boolean isSecure)
constuctors.description: Creates a new instance of the Cookie class using the specified name, value, path, age, and the secure setting.

methods.name: getDomain
methods.description: Returns the name of the server making the request.

methods.name: getMaxAge
methods.description: Returns a number representing how long the cookie is valid for, in seconds. If set to < 0, a session cookie is issued. If set to 0, the cookie is deleted.

methods.name: getName
methods.description: Returns the name of the cookie. Can't be null.

methods.name: getPath
methods.description: Returns the path from which you can retrieve the cookie. If null or blank, the location is set to root, or “/”.

methods.name: getValue
methods.description: Returns the data captured in the cookie, such as Session ID.

methods.name: isSecure
methods.description: Returns true if the cookie can only be accessed through HTTPS, otherwise returns false.
